includedAssets.title: Unbreak-Able
includedAssets.synopsis: Norman and Emma go on a hike, Norma takes a psychology class and Romero investigates two murders.

includedAssets.title: The Deal
includedAssets.synopsis: As Norma gains the upper hand, she turns to Romero for help, while Norman finds his sanity weakening.

includedAssets.title: The Last Supper
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma attempts to bring her family together and find help for Norman as his mental state deteriorates. Dylan learns more about Emma's illness.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Season three of the chilling drama following the antagonist of Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho. Norma desperately tries to protect her family as Norman's mental issues dramatically escalate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season three of the chilling drama following the antagonist of Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho. Norma tries to save her family as Norman's issues escalate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Season three of the chilling drama following the antagonist of Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho. Norma desperately tries to protect her family as Norman's mental issues dramatically escalate.

includedIn.title: Bates Motel
includedIn.synopsis: After the sudden death of her husband, Norma Bates and her son Norman move from Arizona to Oregon to start a new life running a motel. Things don't go to plan however, as the pair are forced to hide a grave secret while coping with Norman's deteriorating.
